summary.span: 表示对一组列的限制，列中的所有值必须是唯一的。

span.span: Represents a restriction on a set of columns in which all values must be unique.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ) (或列的单个列上强制实施，以确保主键值是唯一的。The is enforced on a single column (or columns) to ensure that a primary key value is unique. 除非将属性设置为，否则不会强制实施约束 `true` 。Constraints are not enforced unless the property is set to `true`. 当 与第二个合并时 ，将不强制执行约束，直到完成所有合并。When the a is merged with a second , constraints are not enforced until all merges are completed. ## Examples 下面的示例将添加 到 ，并将 属性设置为 `true` 。The following example adds a to a and sets the property to `true`. [!code-vb[Classic WebData UniqueConstraint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData UniqueConstraint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型适用于多线程读取操作。

span.span: This type is suitable for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 必须同步任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在 Visual Studio .NET 环境中提供设计时支持。This constructor is provided for design time support in the Visual Studio .NET environment. 因此，使用此构造函数创建的 对象必须通过 添加到集合中。 objects created by using this constructor must then be added to the collection via . 在调用该方法时，必须存在具有指定名称的列，或者，如果在 调用此构造函数之前调用了，则具有指定名称的列必须在调用时存在 。Columns with the specified names must exist at the time the method is called, or if has been called prior to calling this constructor, the columns with the specified names must exist at the time that is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个约束限制相同的列，则这两个约束相等。Two constraints are equal if they constrain the same columns. ## Examples 下面的示例比较两个 UniqueConstraint 对象。The following example compares two UniqueConstraint objects. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示约束是否在主键上。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether or not the constraint is on a primary key.

value.span: 如果约束在主键上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the constraint is on a primary key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表通常包含一个主键，确保每一行都是唯一的。A table usually includes a primary key that ensures every row is unique. 在某些表中，主键可能由多个列组成。In some tables, the primary key may be made up of more than one column. 例如，包含名称的表的主键可以同时由名字和姓氏组成。For example, a primary key for a table containing names might be made up of both the first and last names as well. 若要创建具有多个列的主键，请将 Columns 属性设置为 DataColumn 对象的数组。To create a primary key with more than one column, set the Columns property to an array of DataColumn objects. ## Examples 下面的示例检查 属性。The following example checks the property. [!code-vb[Classic WebData UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
